Destroy At Position: This action block will destroy all instances found at the point given, calling the Destroy Event and then the Clean Up Event for all instances found. Note that this action is based on the collision mask of the instances, and if any part of the mask over-laps with the target point it then the function will destroy that instance (if the instances have no sprite or mask applied, then they will not be destroyed).
